title: Coach required for Professional team
body:
MUST HAVE EXPERIENCE FROM PREVIOUS TEAM OR HAVE REALLY GOOD GAME KNOWLEDGE AND GAME SENSE AND KNOWS HOW TO COMMUNICATE WITH THEIR PLAYERS
Hey this is from a professional internatinal organisation and the LOL team requires a coach and if interested please add UP Vespik on OCE lol Servers

replies.body: What it sounds like what you need is rather a analyst. A coach doesnt even need to have the most in game knowledge. A coach will rather set up exercises for the team and get the team playing better as a whole taking care of the players letting the analyst analyse the games and tell the team what they did wrong and what they did good. I know as I have been a coach of a challenger team and a soccer team and coaches are different from what I see you want.
